title: Liam Hemsworth is bruised and bloodied as he films Dodge And Miles amid Miley Cyrus split drama
text:
He was hit by a taxi, yelled at by the driver then forced to take to his heels after hearing a gunshot.

But it's all in a day's work for Liam Hemsworth who was seen filming his new movie, Dodge And Miles, in Toronto, Canada on Saturday.

While the 29-year-old star looked bloodied and bruised, he didn't seem too bothered by the fake injuries between takes, seen smiling while sipping on a beverage.

All in a day's work: Liam Hemsworth was knocked over by a cab, yelled at by the driver and shot at while he was filming Dodge And Miles in Toronto, Canada on Saturday

Liam is hard at work after a tough summer following his split from Miley Cyrus, his wife of just eight months.

The couple met while filming The Last Song in June 2009 and quickly became an item.

They had an on-again, off-again relationship for three years, announcing their engagement in June 2012.

But they called it off in September 2013 with Liam telling the New York Post a year later, 'we'll always be best friends.'

Running through the rain: The 29-year-old star took to his heels after hearing a gun shot

Bloodied and bruised: But Liam's not broken and he smiled as he had a drink during a break in filming

The 'best friends' were spotted together again in January 2016 and Miley put her engagement ring back on.

They tied the knot in Tennessee with her family last December but marriage wasn't enough to keep them together.

'Liam and Miley love each other a lot, but they’re incredibly different people and at times have struggled to make things work,' an insider told The Sun in August.

Chic couple: Liam's had a tough summer after he and his wife of just eight months, Miley Cyrus, seen here at the Mat Gala in New York in May, split up in August

'They had problems for years, a lot of secret break-ups – but everyone thought that the wedding would make things right.

'In the end it seemed to us like the wedding was like a band aid [plaster] that was trying to stick over the cracks in the relationship.'

Meanwhile, the couple's divorce is expected to come through by Halloween according to People thanks to a locked-tight pre-nup.
